page.title: 07STANWAY SAND & GRAVEL PITS
page.content: There are many{sand and gravel pits in our area.Two boys visited a local pit which has been worked for 58 years.90 acres have been dug.The material is dug out by{excavator operated by one man.8 other men are employed.The machinery is mainly {electrically operated.}Two thousand tons of sand and gravel are produced each week much of which is taken from the site by teams of lorries. Because this area is expanding much sand and gravel is needed for{building new housing estates and roads. When the quarry is exhausted the company hopes to fill it in and make it into a{leisure park,golf course and {boating lake.
